code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import reducers from'./reducers';import state from'./state';export default createStore(reducers,state,applyMiddleware(thunk));

sourcesContent:
import { createStore, applyMiddleware } from 'redux'
import thunk from 'redux-thunk'
import reducers from './reducers'
import state from './state'

export default createStore(reducers, state, applyMiddleware(thunk))
